creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: reproduction of black and white photograph of Native Americans in front of teepee, with man in foreground at right seen from back playing a drum, with one man in Western garments at right edge of image; printed text in black in upper right:  "To Thee we sing"; five beaded medallions with silver beaded ground and blue lettering, with one letter on each medallion, spelling, "BINGO", horizontally across center of sheet; white frame
title: Dear America: To Thee We Sing
